thread.title: BRIEF-Setanta Makes 3.9 Mln Zloty Write-Down On Its Financial Assets

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Setanta Makes 3.9 Mln Zloty Write-Down On Its Financial Assets
text:
Feb 7(Reuters) - SETANTA ALTERNATYWNA SPOLKA INWESTYCYJNA :
* SAID ON TUESDAY IT DECIDED TO MAKE A 3.9 MLN ZLOTY WRITE-DOWN DUE TO DECREASE IN VALUE OF ITS FINANCIAL ASSETS
* WRITE-DOWN REFLECTS LOSS OF VALUE OF 80% STAKE THAT COMPANY HOLDS IN KANTORINO SP. Z O.O.
* WRITE-DOWN WILL IMPACT COMPANYâ€˜S 2017 NET FINANCIAL RESULT BY 3.9 MLN ZLOTYS BUT WILL NOT INFLUENCE ITS LIQUIDITY
Source text for Eikon:
Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
